main event: A United Airlines pilot reported sighting mysterious fiery globules over the Pacific Ocean on June 18, 1959.
interesting points: The pilot observed four round, fiery globules of intense bluish-white color,The objects were seen at an altitude of approximately 16,000 feet,The sighting lasted only about 2-5 seconds,Another aircraft reported witnessing the same sighting at the same time,Military officials were particularly concerned about the sighting due to the context of potential Russian missile tests in the area.
sighted object: four round, fiery globules of intense bluish-white color
witness description: A pilot of a United Airlines flight
